data.name: Scooby
data.description:
1-  What Is SCOOBY (SBD) ?

SCOOBY token is designed and built from the ground up to become a source of steady passive income for holders. Part of our token sales get redistributed into holders’ wallets as BTC/BNB and SCOOBY tokens. We are developing a launchpad, which will allow the launch and support for coins with a low market capitalization.


2- SCOOBY is the native utility token used for:

* Getting rewards based on the amount of tokens held.
* Participation in exclusive pre-sales for the launch of new tokens


3- SCOOBY tools include: 

* A dashboard to track the amount of tokens held, and to claim $BTC/$BNB rewards every 7 days.
* An anti-Whales system (any transaction that trade more than 0.05% of the total supply will be rejected)
* The release of the Launchpad will allow for the support, marketing and promotion of projects, support from our teams, and the deployment of projects on the Scooby website.


4-  What Makes SCOOBY Unique?

Scooby provides a real solution to the uncontrollable expansion of the Binance Smart Chain tokens by helping serious projects to gain visibility and credibility, also by promoting them to the community while filtering potential scams and projects lacking of seriousness.


5-  How Many Scooby Coins Are There in Circulation?

Multiple steps were necessary to arrive at the final version of Scooby.
April 23, 2021 is the date of the latest contract created for the $SBD token. The initial supply was 1,000,000,000,000 tokens.
The current circulation supply is 430 Trillions and will be decreasing with our deflationary tokenomics.


6-  Who Are the Founders of SCOOBY ?

@ScoobyDev : Main developer of the project, founder & investor
Arturo CRUZ : Visual & Graphic Design lead
Valentin REYNIE : Marketing & Economical Development lead
Naïl OULAMINE : Developer, Marketing & Economical Development lead


7- Where Can I Buy Scooby (SBD)?

SBD is available for trading on a growing number of exchanges.
PancakeSwap offers the largest amount of liquidity as of May 2021, offering a pair with [BNB] [Cointiger](https://coinmarketcap.com/exchanges/cointiger/) is another exchange where SBD can be found with a pair of (sUSDT) , [Coinsbit](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/coinsbit/) is the most recent exchange in which SBD is listed, providing a pair of (USDT), which in the future will expand to add pairs with (BTC) and (ETH).



8- How Is the Scooby Network Secured?

The Scooby contract (0xf0ab4b8daa51f6abf6b4c9fef0cca5d127029aa9) has been audited and certified by solidity.finance.
The details of the audit are available from the following link: https://solidity.finance/audits/Scooby/


9- Related Pages:

Learn more about scooby here : 
https://www.scooby.finance/
https://twitter.com/coinscooby/
